June 13, 1953 D Northumberland Miners Gala (Confined Class)
Northumberland Miners Gala (Confined Class) 100 Test Piece Contest Northumberland Miners' Gala northumberland-miners-gala-confined-class

Bedlington, Northumberland

Claimed to be the 76th annual contest.
